scripts.desc: The purpose of jQuery is to make it much easier to use JavaScript on your website.
A full-featured markdown parser and compiler, written in JavaScript. Needed for page generation from GitHub!
Sticky is a jQuery plugin that gives you the ability to make any element on your page always stay visible.
Miuri is simple JavaScript class for parsing URIs.
A JavaScript visualization library for HTML and SVG. http://d3js.org
A modern dialog library which is highly configurable and easy to style
A more-fun, semantic, alternative to datatables http://www.dynatable.com
